Title: Pre-procurement milestones
Description: For events during the planning or pre-procurement phase of a process, such as the preparation of key studies.

Title: Approval
Description: For events such as the sign-off of a contract or project.

Title: Engagement milestones
Description: For engagement milestones, such as a public hearing.

Title: Assessment milestones
Description: For assessment and adjudication milestones, such as the meeting date of a committee.

Title: Delivery milestones
Description: For delivery milestones, such as the date when a good or service should be provided.

Title: Reporting milestones
Description: For reporting milestones, such as when key reports should be provided.

Title: Financing milestones
Description: For events such as planned payments, or equity transfers in public private partnership projects.

Title: Procurement
Description: Events taking place during the procurement which are not captured by fields in core OCDS, such as additional enquiry periods or draft tender submissions in a competitive dialogue process

Title: Contract close
Description: Events such as commercial and financial close
